pr_title: Update: PerfTimer use throwing functions and unify timing method names to 'time'

timeline.message:
Update: PerfTimer use throwing functions and unify timing method names to 'time'

Having throwing functions makes using PerfTimer easier, the inner code executed
by the function can throw without needing to be explicitly wrapped with a
new try/catch.
Re-order methods (fixes checkstyle), group method overloads together

timeline.author: RoiEXLab
